master

Class TwoWheeledRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • master.TwoWheeledRobot

  • public class TwoWheeledRobot
extends Object
    Holds all the information about our robot and the algorithms needed to convert high level distance into lower level wheel rotations and motor controls
    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplacement

        public double getDisplacement()
        Returns:
        the displacement of the robot from the start of movement

      • getHeading

        public double getHeading()
        Returns:
        current heading of the robot using the tacho count of both motors

      • getDisplacementAndHeading

        public void getDisplacementAndHeading(double[] data)
        A combination of the getDisplacement and getHeading methods
        Parameters:
        data - an array that will store the data {displacement, heading}
